WorkflowInfo.Name: Provision AWS EC2 from Slack
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <Split x:Name="splitName" activityLicenseType="1" id="313" name="Split" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Split" Description="Splits a selected string into sub strings (according to a specified delimiter) and returns a one-dimensional table containing the sub strings" TheValue="%user%" SelectionType="1" TheValue2=" " SelectedKey="Enter" TypeName="Split" label="Split" description="Splits a selected string into sub strings (according to a specified delimiter) and returns a one-dimensional table containing the sub strings" notes="" /> <GetCellValue x:Name="nameFirst" activityLicenseType="1" id="276" name="GetCellValue" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Get Cell Value" Description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" ResultSet="%splitName%" ResultSetName="split1" RowNumber="1" ColumnType="Number" ColumnNumber="1" TypeName="GetCellValue" label="Get Cell Value" description="Retrieves a cell's value according to its location in a table" notes="" /> <SlackSendMessage x:Name="slackGreetingAndSelectRegion" activityLicenseType="1" id="497" name="SlackSendMessage" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" TypeName="SlackSendMessage" label="Slack Send Message" notes="" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:10:00" TimeInSeconds="600" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Slack Send Message" Description="Sends a Slack message." SelectedModuleID="4" SelectedModuleName="Slack" conversation="%conversationid%" Password="" user="%userid%" message="Sure, %nameFirst%, I can help provision a new VM in AWS! In what region would you like this machine be created?" conversation_response="Yes" buttons="[{"key":"us-east-1","value":"us-east-2"},{"key":"us-east-2","value":"us-east-2"},{"key":"us-west-1","value":"us-east-2"},{"key":"us-west-2","value":"us-east-2"}]" SelectedModuleType="45" HostName="{x:Null}" HostId="0" description="Sends a Slack message." target_type="User" target="%userid%" /> <SlackSendMessage x:Name="slackSelectImageID" activityLicenseType="1" id="497" name="SlackSendMessage" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" TypeName="SlackSendMessage" label="Slack Send Message" notes="" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:10:00" TimeInSeconds="600" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Slack Send Message" Description="Sends a Slack message." SelectedModuleID="4" SelectedModuleName="Slack" conversation="%conversationid%" Password="" user="%userid%" message="Thank you. Please specify a pre-built image ID." conversation_response="Yes" buttons="[{"key":"Microsoft SQL Server","value":"ami-0c11304115c781410"},{"key":"RHEL Web Server","value":"ami-0c11304115c781410"},{"key":"Oracle DB Server","value":"ami-0c11304115c781410"},{"key":"Windows 10 Workstation","value":"ami-0c11304115c781410"}]" SelectedModuleType="45" HostName="{x:Null}" HostId="0" description="Sends a Slack message." target_type="User" target="%userid%" /> <SlackSendMessage x:Name="slackSelectInstanceType" activityLicenseType="1" id="497" name="SlackSendMessage" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" TypeName="SlackSendMessage" label="Slack Send Message" notes="" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:10:00" TimeInSeconds="600" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Slack Send Message" Description="Sends a Slack message." SelectedModuleID="4" SelectedModuleName="Slack" conversation="%conversationid%" Password="" user="%userid%" message="Okay, last step. Tell me which instance type you'd like." conversation_response="Yes" buttons="[{"key":"T2Micro","value":"T2Micro"},{"key":"T2Small","value":"T2Micro"},{"key":"T2Medium","value":"T2Micro"},{"key":"T2Large","value":"T2Micro"}]" SelectedModuleType="45" HostName="{x:Null}" HostId="0" description="Sends a Slack message." target_type="User" target="%userid%" /> <SlackSendMessage x:Name="slackConfirmCreateVM" activityLicenseType="1" id="497" name="SlackSendMessage" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" TypeName="SlackSendMessage" label="Slack Send Message" notes="" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:10:00" TimeInSeconds="600" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Slack Send Message" Description="Sends a Slack message." SelectedModuleID="4" SelectedModuleName="Slack" conversation="%conversationid%" Password="" user="%userid%" message="Wonderful, I have everything I need. Before I proceed, are you sure that you want to provision this new VM?" conversation_response="Yes" buttons="[{"key":"Yes","value":"yes"},{"key":"No","value":"no"}]" SelectedModuleType="45" HostName="{x:Null}" HostId="0" description="Sends a Slack message." target_type="User" target="%userid%" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1" activityLicenseType="1" id="429" name="IfElseActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="IfElseActivity" notes=""> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1" id="{x:Null}" name="IfElseBranchActivity" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" label="IfElseBranchActivity" description="Executes the activities following this branch when the conditions are met" isDefault="{x:Null}" notes="" useAlternateSetting="False"> <ReturnValue Formula="=Equals(&&&,yes)" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionNumber="0" IsValid="True" Value="yes" ConditionType="Equals" Description="" Type="UserDefinedValue" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseCustomeCondition="False" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" name="ReturnValue" DisplayName="Return Value" TypeName="ReturnValue" Disabled="False" ClusterID="{x:Null}" ClusterName="{x:Null}" x:Name="returnValue6" /> <SlackSendMessage x:Name="slackWaitForNewVM" activityLicenseType="1" id="497" name="SlackSendMessage" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" TypeName="SlackSendMessage" label="Slack Send Message" notes="" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:10:00" TimeInSeconds="600" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Slack Send Message" Description="Sends a Slack message." SelectedModuleID="4" SelectedModuleName="Slack" conversation="%conversationid%" Password="" user="%userid%" message="I'm creating your new AWS VM now! Please stand by..." conversation_response="No" buttons="[]" SelectedModuleType="45" HostName="{x:Null}" HostId="0" description="Sends a Slack message." target_type="User" target="%userid%" />
